Source Ultimate Equipment pg. 22, Advanced Player's Guide pg. 176

[PFS] Statistics

Cost 2 gp Weight 3 lbs.

Category Ammunition; Proficiency Ammunition

Description

These arrows have light shafts and special fletching to give them greater range. A flight arrow's range increment is 20 feet greater with longbows and 10 feet greater with shortbows.

They deal damage as if one size category smaller.
